column5: Nice job Steve, you'd need water wings to be out there today, lol!
Nice work! I planned to do the same thing (monday was my bday) but chickened out due to the weather. Kickin' myself for that decision now!
nice going Steve, just wondering do you bother trying anything else when the swammers are working ? or do you experiment to see if some of your other goto lures will do the trick if the bite is hot ?

I've tried a hundred different baits out there and the swammer by X-Zone is far and away the most productive bait I've ever used to ice lakers.  That said, I still always have a good selection with me as no one bait will ever be the be all, end all.  On any given day the fish may prefer a different approach and it's always worth experimenting.
Given what the rain could do out there today, good call. Thanks for sharing.
how do you icefish swammers anyway? are you dropshotting them or just bouncing bottom with a jighead?or am i asking the magician to reveal his tricks
